name: Crusin' ATL
description:
Experience the high octane rush of driving in one of the most poorly designed cities in the world. Rev those engines and put on your favorite podcast. You are about to be elbow deep in some of the finest traffic based gameplay ever conceived of. Can you beat your friends high score in this action packed Atlanta simulator?

Controls:

Move - WASD

Honk - E

Select - Enter

Back/Quit - Escape
